structured_content.summary: AI Tool Calls — Offline Cheatsheet Copy-paste presets • Works offline This Chat Perplexity Tip: edit placeholders like YOUR QUERY, turnX…, or UTC±HH:MM before you run … card>
action_items: exec Create tables/plots/files that render to the user
create_textdoc Create a rich document/code file in the side canvas

create_textdoc</tool_name> <parameters>{ "name": "Spec Draft", "type": "document", "content": "# Title\\nStart here…" }</parameters> </invoke> </function_calls> Copy Update Canvas (regex replace) canmore
comment_textdoc Add actionable comments anchored to regex matches
create Schedule a recurring task via iCal RRULE
create</tool_name> <parameters>{ "title": "Check headlines", "prompt": "Search for top AI news and summarize for me
text2im Create an image from a prompt (no external deps)

<function_calls> <invoke> <tool_name>search_web</tool_name> <parameters> <queries>["latest AI developments"]</queries> </parameters> </invoke> </function_calls> Copy Fetch URL fetch_url Load content from one or more URLs
") Copy Create Chart create_chart Simple chart from JSON data (explicitly requested)
